summary: A murder mystery set in the world of illegal teenage gambling. A 17-year old must find his best friends' killer before the game is exposed.
cast: Tyler Johnston|Julia Maxwell|Jaren Brandt Bartlett|Calum Worthy|Robert Moloney|Scott Patey|Julian Domingues|Tess Atkins|Kim Kondrashoff|Hrothgar Mathews|Jillian Fargey|Samuel Patrick Chu|Bernie Yao|Jenn Griffin|C. Douglas Quan|Adam Slamang|Brad Williams|Danny Dworkis|Karolina Anna Sabat
title: The Odds
